attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Police dogs should have the same protection in law that a police officer has, anyone atacking or injureing a police dog while undertakeing its duty, should be treated and charge as if they had attacked a serving police officer.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
